Class booking.model.HotelSearch

java.lang.Object
booking.model.HotelSearch
class booking.model.HotelSearch extends Object
The booking.model.HotelSearch class provides functionality to search for hotelList based on room availability and a maximum price limit.

    static List<booking.model.Hotel>
    findHotelsByCriteria(List<booking.model.Hotel> hotelList, double priceLimit, boolean requireAvailability)
    Searches for hotelList that have rooms matching the provided criteria: maximum price and availability.

  • Method Details

    • findHotelsByCriteria

      public static List<booking.model.Hotel> findHotelsByCriteria(List<booking.model.Hotel> hotelList, double priceLimit, boolean requireAvailability)
      Searches for hotelList that have rooms matching the provided criteria: maximum price and availability.
      Parameters:
      hotelList - the list of hotelList to search
      priceLimit - the maximum price for a room
      requireAvailability - if true, only consider available rooms; otherwise, consider all rooms
      Returns:
      a list of hotelList that have rooms matching the search criteria
